stimulusHtml:
Environmentalists want to estimate the percent of trees in a large forest that are infested with a certain beetle. The environmentalists will select a random sample of trees to inspect.

Which of the following is the most appropriate method for creating such an estimate?
choicesHtml: A two-sample z-interval for a population proportion
A one-sample z-interval for a sample proportion
A one-sample z-interval for a population proportion
A two-sample z-interval for a difference between sample proportions
A two-sample z-interval for a difference between population proportions
